Custom Update Mad Rom - 5 minute Bash -.SYNTAX:
print 'Step 1 of 4' && print 'Starting Versions 
 ' && print 'MAD Rom Version:' && cat  /sdcard/madversion && print '16MAD Version:'&& grep uver= /etc/init.d/16mad && print 'update_mad.sh Version:'&& grep version /system/bin/update_mad.sh

print 'Step 2 of 4 - ' && su -c 'mount -o remount,rw /system && /system/bin/curl -k -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Map-A-Droid/MAD-ATV/master/update_mad.sh >/system/bin/update_mad.sh && chmod +x /system/bin/update_mad.sh' && /system/bin/update_mad.sh -i && print 'update_mad.sh and 16mad - Scripts Updated'
Step 3 of 4 - REBOOT DEVICE - Wait for success state please!

print 'Step 4 of 4 - End Versions 
 ' && print 'MAD Rom Version:' && cat  /sdcard/madversion && print '16MAD Version:'&& grep uver= /etc/init.d/16mad && print 'update_mad.sh Version:'&& grep version /system/bin/update_mad.sh
